Description: Pump arrangement drawings and installation design
Notes: 40% of total engineering effort; includes pump layout GA drawings foundation interface piping interface

Description: Pump technical specifications development
Notes: 25% of total engineering effort; railcar marine sump transfer pump specs per API 610

Description: Pump sizing calculations NPSH analysis system curves
Notes: 20% of total engineering effort; hydraulic calculations for all pump services

Description: Vendor data review and approval (data sheets)
Notes: 10% of total engineering effort; review performance curves outline drawings foundation loads

Description: Commissioning documentation and test record review
Notes: 5% of total engineering effort; FAT witness test procedures acceptance criteria

Description: Marine loading pump 400 m3/hr 50kW API 610 (2 units)
SourceRef: A-001 A-002 (Parametric pump quantities and costs)
Notes: Duty/standby configuration; API 610 OH2 or BB2 type; 316SS wetted parts food-grade service

Description: Railcar unloading transfer pump 200 m3/hr 30kW API 610 (4 units)
SourceRef: A-001 A-002 (Parametric pump quantities and costs)
Notes: 2 duty + 2 standby supporting 32 railcar stations; horizontal centrifugal API 610

Description: Tank transfer pump 150 m3/hr 15kW API 610 (2 units)
SourceRef: A-001 A-002 (Parametric pump quantities and costs)
Notes: Tank-to-tank transfer and recirculation; operational flexibility OBJ-4

Description: Sump pump 25 m3/hr 3kW (6 units)
SourceRef: A-001 A-002 (Parametric pump quantities and costs)
Notes: Containment sumps at railcar marine and tank areas; canola oil + water mixture service

Description: Electric motors NEMA Premium efficiency TEFC (14 units)
Notes: Total 406 kW across all pumps; 460V 3-phase typical; coordinate PKG-17/19 for final voltage

Description: Variable frequency drives VFDs (7 units for critical pumps)
SourceRef: A-004 (VFD cost per kW; 50% of pumps)
Notes: VFDs for process control and energy efficiency; critical pumps only

Description: Mechanical seal systems API 682 Type 2 with flush systems
SourceRef: A-011 (15% of pump cost for seal systems)
Notes: Cartridge seals with Plan 11 or Plan 32 support systems; dual seals for critical services TBD

Description: Pump couplings (flexible spacer type) and fabricated baseplates
Notes: API 610 Section 5.4 spacer couplings; grouted structural steel baseplates

Description: Initial spare parts (seals impellers wear rings bearings)
Notes: 1 spare seal per pump type; critical wear parts; spare parts philosophy TBD per ER and OBJ-9

Description: Pump rigging and setting (14 units)
Notes: Crane rental rigging unloading setting on baseplate; 8 manhours per pump avg

Description: Pump-motor alignment and coupling installation (14 units)
Notes: Rough and final alignment per API 610 Section 6.3; dial indicator or laser; 16 manhours per pump

Description: Baseplate grouting non-shrink grout min 25mm (14 units)
Notes: API 610 Section 6.1.4 grouting requirements; 8 manhours per pump

Description: Mechanical completion and pre-comm inspection (14 units)
Notes: Rotation check bolt torque lubrication check; 4 manhours per pump

Description: Construction indirects supervision temp facilities small tools HSE
SourceRef: D-010 (18% of CD per fallback model)
Notes: Site supervision temporary laydown area small tools consumables safety equipment

Description: Procurement services vendor solicitation expediting inspection
Notes: Technical bid evaluation purchase order management expediting receiving inspection

Description: EPCM and project management for PKG-15
SourceRef: A-008 (6% of CD+CI+MAT per fallback model)
Notes: Project management engineering management document control coordination meetings

Description: Performance testing flow head power vibration (14 units)
Notes: Field performance test per API 610 Section 6.9; 12 manhours per pump @ $95/hr

Description: Vibration analysis and alignment verification (14 units)
Notes: Vibration measurement per API 610 Figure 15 or ISO 10816; 4 manhours per pump

Description: FAT witness travel allowance (major pumps)
Notes: Travel to vendor shop for Factory Acceptance Test witness; 6 major pumps assumed
